title: Wookiwoo, I Love You
description: In this heartwarming story, Wookiwoo is a happy little green bird who has found a new friend named Jack. Wookiwoo is always there for Jack as he grows up to be a young man. In time Jack outgrows his pet and sets him free. Wookiwoo meets up with Lu Lu, another parrot he knew from the pet store and they have a family of their own. The ending connects friendship, letting go, and those three little word "I Love You, in unconditional love.
author: Darren Perman
